name: cfoutput
description:
Displays output that can contain the results of processing
 CFML variables and functions. Can loop over the results
 of a database query.

params.name: query
params.description: Name of cfquery from which to draw data for output section.

params.name: group
params.description:
Query column to use to group sets of records. Eliminates
 adjacent duplicate rows when data is sorted. Use if you
 retrieved a record set ordered on one or more a query
 columns. For example, if a record set is ordered on
 "Customer_ID" in the cfquery tag, you can group the output
 on "Customer_ID."

params.name: groupcasesensitive
params.description: Whether to consider the case in grouping rows.

params.name: startrow
params.description: Row from which to start output.

params.name: maxrows
params.description: Maximum number of rows to display.

examples.title: Script Example
